channel.title: How do I add portals and npc's to my server?
channel.description:
hello, I was just wondering how I add portals and npc's to my server. I have a source and npcs have been added, but I need to add portals.
Many Thanks James.

item.title: How do I add portals and npc's to my server?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

i know how, you just go to client.java and it should be close to the top but it looks like this.

makeGlobalObject(ID,Xcoords,Ycoords,height,direction)
add that with the id the x and y coords the height and the direction which dosen’t really matter.
add it under

public void oblakowns() {
and you should have portals and other objects

Read full topic
item.source: How do I add portals and npc's to my server?

item.title: How do I add portals and npc's to my server?

item.description:

portals… are global objects…

try pming fedexer for the global objects tutorial
